pattern: R1: 6 sc crochet in magic ring (6)
R2: inc in each stitch around (12)
R5-R7: sc in each stitch for all rounds (24)
Fasten off and close the opening.
R1: 6 sc crochet in magic ring (6)
R2: inc in each stitch around (12)
R5-R7: sc in each stitch for all rounds (24)
Fasten off and close the opening.
R1: 6 sc crochet in magic ring (6)
R2: inc in each stitch around (12)
R5-R7: sc in each stitch for all rounds (24)
Fasten off and close the opening.
R1: 6 sc crochet in magic ring (6)
R2: inc in each stitch around (12)
R5-R7: sc in each stitch for all rounds (24)
Fasten off and close the opening.
R2: 2 dc in between every 1dc from R1
R3: 3 dc in between every 2dc from R2
R4-R6: 3 dc in between 3 dc from earlier rounds. NB: Check if christmas ornament (ball) fits inside pattern
R7: 2 dc in between dc in R6
R8: Close off opening (with ball inside pattern) by threading needle into stitches and tighten
R1: Chain 50 (or as long as you want the box)
R2: stat sc from second chain of hook. sc into every stitch till end
R3: Fasten off and tie the bow around christmas ornament
note: On christmas ball pattern, work in continous rounds

pattern: R1: 6 sc crochet in magic ring (6)
R2: inc in each stitch around (12)
R5-R7: sc in each stitch for all rounds (24)
Fasten off and close the opening.
note: Work in continous rounds. Use a stitch marker to mark the first stitch of each round!
